name: beauty256
summary: A beautiful theme specially designed for xterm with 256 color
description:
this is my first theme here. it uses natural and friendly colors. and convert your terminal vim to modern-looking IDE.
screenshots are here: 

http://b.imagehost.org/view/0306/beauty256.png
http://b.imagehost.org/view/0309/beauty256_2.png

this is specially designed for xterm with 256 color like terminal of ubuntu systems.
install_details:
copy the beauty256.vim script to $HOME/.vim/colors folder.
dont forget to add this line to your .vimrc

set t_Co=256
color beauty256

first line set vim to use 256 color in terminal.
